content.text: Match ends, West Ham United 2, Aston Villa 0.
Second Half ends, West Ham United 2, Aston Villa 0.
Substitution, West Ham United. Pedro Obiang replaces Cheikhou Kouyaté.
Attempt missed. Nikica Jelavic (West Ham United) right footed shot from outside the box misses to the right. Assisted by Mark Noble.
Attempt blocked. Cheikhou Kouyaté (West Ham United) right footed shot from outside the box is blocked. Assisted by Alexandre Song.
Substitution, West Ham United. Nikica Jelavic replaces Michail Antonio.
Attempt saved. Jordan Veretout (Aston Villa) right footed shot from outside the box is saved in the centre of the goal. Assisted by Idrissa Gueye.
Substitution, West Ham United. Victor Moses replaces Enner Valencia.

Goal!  West Ham United 2, Aston Villa 0. Cheikhou Kouyaté (West Ham United) right footed shot from the centre of the box to the high centre of the goal. Assisted by Enner Valencia following a fast break.
Corner,  Aston Villa. Conceded by James Tomkins.
Attempt saved. Dimitri Payet (West Ham United) right footed shot from outside the box is saved in the top centre of the goal. Assisted by Michail Antonio.
Substitution, Aston Villa. Scott Sinclair replaces Gabriel Agbonlahor.
Foul by Gabriel Agbonlahor (Aston Villa).
